onBoarding.btcBackedAssetSubTitle: RGB protocol allows anyone to issue, send, or receive assets on the most secure blockchain, using sats from your wallet as fuel for these assets.
onBoarding.btcBackedAssetInfo: Sats from your wallet will be used as fuel for these assets.
onBoarding.rememberPasscodeSubTitle: Please remember your passcode and backup your app by writing down the 12-word recovery key
onBoarding.rememberPasscodeDesc: You would be locked out of the app if you forget your passcode and will have to recover it.
onBoarding.authSubTitle: To proceed, please authenticate yourself and ensure the.
onBoarding.supportTermAndConditionTitle: By checking this box, you agree to the terms and conditions.
onBoarding.termAndConditionBrief: Tribe RGB provides an option to connect external nodes; however, support for this feature is managed by an external service provider. Please review the following terms:
onBoarding.termAndConditionSubTitle1: Tribe RGB offers a feature to connect external nodes but does not provide support or assume responsibility for the connection process or related issues.
onBoarding.termAndConditionSubTitle2: For assistance with setup or troubleshooting, please contact the external provider directly, as they manage all support for external node connectivity.
onBoarding.termAndConditionSubTitle3: Tribe RGB is not liable for any data loss, misconfigurations, or other consequences resulting from connecting to an external node. Use this option at your discretion.
onBoarding.termAndConditionSubTitle4: Tribe RGB may update this feature without notice. Any changes to support availability or terms should be confirmed with the external provider.
onBoarding.termAndConditionSubTitle5: These terms are governed by the applicable jurisdiction’s laws
onBoarding.useRGBAssetSubTitle: These assets are on the testnet/regnet, have no real value, and can be reset anytime. For play only.
onBoarding.nodeConnectingSubTitle: Connecting to your node. Keep the app open and screen unlocked.
onBoarding.supportNodeConnectingSubTitle: Connecting to your node. Keep the app open and screen unlocked.
onBoarding.nodeconnectSuccessfulSubTitle: You’re now connected. Proceed to the next step.
onBoarding.profileSetupLoadingSubTitle: Sit back and relax as we get everything ready for you. Your app will be ready in just a moment.
onBoarding.recoverLoadingSubTitle: Please hold on for a moment while we complete the recovery process. Avoid closing the app to ensure everything runs smoothly. Thank you for your patience!
onBoarding.onchainLearMoreInfo: A secure wallet for all your Bitcoin transactions.
onBoarding.lightningLearnMoreInfo: Fast and low-cost transactions for small amounts.
onBoarding.supportLearnMoreInfo: A wallet compatible with other Bitcoin applications.
onBoarding.onChainLearnMoreSubTitle: An On-Chain Wallet ensures full control of your Bitcoin by storing it securely on the Bitcoin blockchain.
onBoarding.onchainLearnMoreContent1: You own your private keys for ultimate security.
onBoarding.onchainLearnMoreContent2: Transactions are fully recorded on the blockchain.
onBoarding.onchainLearnMoreContent3: Long-term storage and secure large transactions.
onBoarding.onchainLearnMoreContent4: Take full control of your Bitcoin with self-custody on-chain.
onBoarding.lnLearnMoreSubtitle: A Lightning Wallet offers fast and cost-effective Bitcoin transactions while maintaining full control over your funds.
onBoarding.lnLearnMoreContent1: You hold your private keys, ensuring complete ownership and security.
onBoarding.lnLearnMoreContent2: Perfect for quick payments with minimal fees.
onBoarding.lnLearnMoreContent4: Enjoy the speed and efficiency of Bitcoin with self-custody on the Lightning Network.
onBoarding.supportLearnMoreSubtitle: A Supported Wallet provides a balance of convenience and security by leveraging relay services for asset management.
onBoarding.supportLearnMoreContent1: Custody is managed with the help of a trusted relay, simplifying wallet management.
onBoarding.supportLearnMoreContent2: Ideal for users who prefer a straightforward setup and minimal complexity.
onBoarding.supportLearnMoreContent3: Relay-based backups ensure asset recovery and secure management.
onBoarding.supportLearnMoreContent4: Enjoy a user-friendly experience with enhanced security in Supported Mode.

home.addAssetSubTitle: Issue new asset or receive assets
home.noAssetSubTitle: Tap the plus icon below to issue your first asset.
home.noCollectibleAssetSubTitle: Ready to create your masterpiece? Tap the "+" icon below to issue your first RGB collectible and start managing your digital assets today. Create, manage, and send collectibles seamlessly.
home.noCoinAssetSubTitle: Ready to create your masterpiece? Tap the "+" icon below to issue your first RGB coin and start managing your digital assets today. Create, manage, and send coins seamlessly.
home.backupAlertTitle:
Secure Your Funds 
with a Backup
home.backupAlertSubTitle: Backing up your wallet ensures that your funds are safe, even if you lose your device. Take a moment to create a backup now.

settings.walletBackupInfo: Write down your seed phrase and store it securely outside the app.
settings.assetBackupInfo1: Backup your RGB assets and states is necessary to restore them later.
settings.assetBackupInfo2: We automatically backup on secure relay servers.
settings.assetBackupInfo3: The backup file is encrypted using your seed phrase.
settings.assetBackupInfo4: Download and keep the backup file with you for additional security.
